text.jpText:
『天皇賞（秋）』が始まる。出走者の1人、
マチカネタンホイザは少し抜けているところ
が親しみやすい“普通”のウマ娘だった。
text.enText:
The Tennou-sho (Emperor's Championship) 
is about to begin. One of the runners, Machikane 
Tanhoyza, was a "normal" horsegirl who 
was a bit out of the ordinary and easy to 
relate to. She is a "normal" horsegirl 
who is a little out of the ordinary, but 
easy to get along with.

text.jpText:
だが、ナリタブライアンは『負けない！』と
宣言してきた彼女の強さを見抜いていた。
そして『全身全霊で応じる』と返すのだった。
text.enText:
But Naritabryan saw through her strength, 
declaring, "I will not be defeated!" She saw 
through her strength, declaring, "I will not 
be defeated! She replied, "I will respond 
with my whole heart and soul.
